text:
@seanhannity @tedcruz @dbongino @GeraldoRivera @LawrenceBJones3 @PeteHegseth @KarlRove @GovMikeHuckabee @MikeRowe Nope! Nothing about a NTL response to COVID19 or the failed economy or Trumps inability to take action on intel that Putin was  killing American servicemen.  

You are the definition of a sycophantic kiss ass. Your show is UnAmerican in every way. #TrumpVirus #TraitorTrump
